title: Making Plans with BALL
subtitle: Take the first step towards homeownership.

steps.title: Accessible to Everyone
steps.description: BALL is committed to making the dream of homeownership accessible to everyone. Our platform is free for all users, allowing anyone to create an account and explore our services without any upfront costs or obligations.

steps.title: Check Your Eligibility
steps.description: To determine if you're ready to become a landlord, utilize BALL's eligibility page. Here, you can assess your financial readiness and explore the various payment plans available to you. By understanding your eligibility, you can make informed decisions about your path to homeownership.
